attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As this government has,without holding a referendum, now committed to EU regulation all MP's should resign as any powers previously decided in Westminster are now irrelevant. If any MP is willing to tear up ALL agreements with the EU then they should stand on a basis of tearing up All such agreements and only commit to trading agreements which was why we enterted into the EU in the first place!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
